Department of Smart Engineering and Advanced Technology
=======================================================

The Department of Smart Engineering and Advanced Technology is at the forefront of integrating artificial intelligence (AI) into the engineering and advanced technology domains. Through exploration and development, we leverage AI and its applications, including machine learning, computer vision, automation, and robotics, to tackle intricate engineering challenges. Our approach involves synthesizing knowledge from diverse disciplines, ensuring that AI is seamlessly integrated into advanced engineering systems and technologies. By harnessing the power of AI, we drive innovation, efficiency, and precision, ultimately advancing the forefront of engineering and technology while addressing complex real-world problems.

##### Niche Area

**Smart/ Intelligent Materials for Buildings | Sustainable Smart Construction | Renewable Energy and AI | Computational Fabrication and Manufacturing | AI in Manufacturing | AI And Optimisation Methods | Automation Technology | Smart/ Intelligent Materials for Engineering | Intelligent System Engineering | Smart Energy Innovation | Intelligent Sensors | Optical And Quantum Systems | Intelligent Power System | Intelligent Communication System |Smart Medical Technology and Analytics | AI and Robotics | Intelligent Forensic and Risk Engineering | Intelligent Environmental Protection | Occupational, Safety and Health (OSH)**
